Mia Program Reference 31.01.2012
GertWollny
This reference document contains desctriptions for the command line tools and plug-ins provided by the MIA toolkit. To learn more about MIA please visit the web site http://mia.sourceforge.net
Introduction
In this document you will find descriptions for all the programs and plug-ins currently included in the MIA software package. This document is maintained by Gert Wollny <gw.fossdev@gmail.com>. Additions, hints, modifications, and corrections are welcome.
The documentation provided here can always be recreated from the source distribution of the MIA toolkit, provided that you work on a platform on which the platform can be compiled and you use a Make based build system.
